headline: Gen Digital Inc. (GEN): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Gen Digital Inc. on Bullseye Research’s Substack by Bullseye Investing. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on GEN. Gen Digital Inc.’s share was trading at $22.35 as of February 20th. GEN’s trailing and forward P/E were 29.25 and 11.05 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Gen Digital is a […]
